oglm 0.1.0
  • Reference

    oglm

    A package to work with interval regression and ordered logit and probit models

    ⚠️ oglm is a personal adaptation of oglmx 📦 available on CRAN. Because the 📦 does not look actively maintened and I needed a few enhancement, I started to work on the source code

    Installation

    You can install the github version of oglm with:

    devtools::install_github("linogaliana/oglm")

    Difference with oglmx 📦

    This 📦 has a few difference with oglmx 📦 that are listed here:

    • The 📦 presents some tests and is built using continuous integration (based on travis) !
    • predict method
    • …
